front.title: Large Flow Classification in Flow Aware Transport over PSN

abstract.t: Network traffic has shown the combination of few very high bit rateflows (large flow) and a huge amount of very low bit rate flows(small flow), which causes uneven load balance over ECMP or LAG.Differentiating large flow and small flow packets in IP/MPLSnetworks enables an enhanced ECMP transport. Enhanced ECMP appliesdifferent distribution methods to large flow packets and small flowpackets to improve the load balance and congestion control. Thisdraft proposes large flow classification scheme for flow awarenesstransport in PSN.
